org.mmbase.util.logging

Class BufferedLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.util.logging.AbstractSimpleImpl
      • org.mmbase.util.logging.BufferedLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logger

    public class BufferedLogger
extends AbstractSimpleImpl
    A Logger that buffers in memory, and on request logs again to a certain other logger.
    Since:
    MMBase-1.9.1
    Version:
    $Id: WriterLogger.java,v 1.4 2009/03/16 15:17:02 michiel Exp $
    Author:
    Michiel Meeuwissen

      • log

        protected void log(String s,
                   Level level)
        Description copied from class: AbstractSimpleImpl
        Logs a message for a certain string. Default calls AbstractSimpleImpl.log(String) where the string is prefixed with the level. Override this one if you want it differently.
        Overrides:
        log in class AbstractSimpleImpl
